column5: Team buy is having a special for $29  just wanted to let you guys know  http://www.teambuy.ca/kitchener/28138757
Hey great! Thanks for the link. Haven't had much need in the past (no boat), but been spending more time recently in others boats so makes sense to get it anyhow.
That's about half what my brother in-law paid.......good deal.
yep, just bought mine today for the upcoming muskoka trip.  now I can go out alone without having to bother my bro-in-law to come drive the boat
Thanks for the post! That price pushed me to finally get it done.
The price of the operator card sure has gone up over the year (close to 60 dollars) as I paid only twenty dollars back in 2000 at The Ontario Sportsmen Show through the Better Boating Company......
passed the test today, im officially good to go!
